    • Method Detail

      • setElements

        public void setElements(java.util.List<Draw> elements_roads,
                        java.util.List<Draw> elements_stops,
                        java.util.List<Draw> elements_vehicles,
                        java.util.List<java.lang.String> array_buslines_numbers,
                        java.util.List<java.time.LocalTime> array_buslines_leave_times,
                        java.util.List<Street> arraystreet)
        Method sets and imports all the important variables as well as draws initial City Map. Buses are not visible until they leave the first bus stop on their route.
        Parameters:
        elements_roads - List of Drawable objects containing streets and their names
        elements_stops - List of Drawable objects containing stops and their names
        elements_vehicles - List of Drawable objects containing buses and their names
        array_buslines_numbers - List of Strings that contains all possible bus line numbers
        array_buslines_leave_times - List of LocalTimes that contains all the departure times of all buses in simulation
        arraystreet - List of street on the map

      • startTime

        public void startTime(double scale)
        Method creates timertask to be repeated every second to simulate movement of buses.
        Parameters:
        scale - Double value used during fastening of the simulation
